## Bio

Keene Morrow is a scientist who is passionate about using data analysis and visualization to solve environmental problems. They love making maps, playing with ggplot2, and being bad at surfing.

## My Work

From solar panel siting to geospatial life cycle assessment to cataloging (almost) every conserved parcel in Connecticut, Keene's passion for exceptional data organization and analysis unites their interdisciplinary environmental science work.

[Find out more in the Projects section.](kamorrow.github.io/projects)
